description: Complete analytics map for the search journey - from search bar click through universal search, stop-based trip planner search, to result selection.

searchSessionId.description: Unique session ID for tracking a complete search session from open to close. Generated as timestamp at search screen open.

searchScreenType.description: Type of search screen that was opened (universal search, route-specific, stop-specific, trip planner).

searchScreenInputScreen.description: The screen/source from which search was initiated (e.g., home, route details, trip planner).

noOfRecentTripsAvailable.description: Count of recent trips shown in search suggestions when screen opens.

queryString.description: The search query text entered by user.

queryLength.description: Character count of the search query (as string).

loadingTime.description: Time taken to load and display search results, in milliseconds (as string).

userLatLong.description: User's GPS coordinates formatted as 'lat: {latitude}, long: {longitude}'.

totalResults.description: Total count of all search results returned (routes + stops + places).

ROUTE.description: Count of route results in search (as string).

TRIPS_LOCATIONS.description: Count of location/place results in search (as string).

TRIPS_STOPS.description: Count of stop results in search (as string).

error message.description: Error message when search results fail to load.

searchResultId.description: Backend ID of the selected search result.

searchResultPosition.description: Position/rank of selected result in search list (1-based index, as string).

searchResultName.description: Display name of the selected search result.

totalStopsAndPlaces.description: Combined count of stops and places in search results.

totalRoutes.description: Count of routes in search results.

resultLatLong.description: GPS coordinates of the selected result formatted as 'lat: {latitude}, long: {longitude}'.

isRecentResult.description: Whether the selected item is from recent searches (boolean as string).

isDeviceBackClicked.description: Whether device back button was used to exit search (boolean as string).

timeFromResultShown.description: Time elapsed from when results were shown to when back/clear was clicked, in milliseconds (as string).

searchResult1Type.description: Type of the 1st search result in the list (STOP, LOCATION, etc.).

searchResult1Name.description: Name of the 1st search result in the list.

searchResult2Type.description: Type of the 2nd search result in the list.

searchResult2Name.description: Name of the 2nd search result in the list.

searchResult3Type.description: Type of the 3rd search result in the list.

searchResult3Name.description: Name of the 3rd search result in the list.

location.description: Location/place name for legacy universal item clicked events.

stop.description: Stop name for legacy universal item clicked events.

stopId.description: Stop ID for legacy universal item clicked events.

route name.description: Route name for legacy universal item clicked events.

routeid.description: Route ID for legacy universal item clicked events.

startStop.description: Start stop name for route items.

isFreeRide.description: Whether the route offers free rides (boolean as string).

length.description: Query length for legacy universal item clicked events (as string).

universal item clicked.description: Type of item clicked in universal search (LOCATION, STOP, ROUTE, TRIP_STOP, TRIP_LOCATION).

fromRecentList.description: Whether item is from recent list (boolean as string).

isPopularRoute.description: Whether route is a popular route (boolean as string).

searchString.description: Search query string (only included if not recent/popular item).

hourOfEvent.description: Hour of day when event occurred (0-23).

origin.description: Origin location name for recent trip results.

destination.description: Destination location name for recent trip results.

search bar title.description: Placeholder text shown in the search bar when clicked.

card position.description: Position index of the recent search card clicked (as string).

searchTarget.description: Which field is being searched (FROM or TO) in stop-based trip planner.

from_type.description: Type of FROM selection (STOP or PLACE).

to_type.description: Type of TO selection (STOP or PLACE).

count.description: Count of nearby stops found for a place.

errorType.description: Type of error when nearest stop fetch fails.

previousScreen.description: Previous screen before opening stop-based trip planner search.

stages.name: Entry
stages.description: User initiates search from various entry points in the app
events: home screen bottom nav search tab clicked
regular bus page recent search card clicked

stages.name: Universal Search
stages.description: Main search experience - screen open, typing, viewing results, selecting items
events: first character type after search open

stages.name: Stop-Based Trip Planner Search
stages.description: Dedicated search flow for trip planning with from/to location selection
events: stop trip planner search screen opened
stop trip planner search from clicked
stop trip planner search to clicked
stop trip planner search recent clicked
no nearby stops found for place

stages.name: Misc
events: universal search city fetch from location failed

events.name: Search results shown
events.description: Search results are fetched and displayed to user. Includes result counts, loading time, and error details if failed.

properties.context: Time taken to fetch and display results (ms)

events.name: bottom sheet closed button clicked
events.description: User closes the bottom sheet showing nearby stops.

events.name: chalo search bar clicked
events.description: User clicks the search bar on home screen or regular bus tab to initiate search.

properties.context: Placeholder text shown in search bar

events.name: first character type after search open
events.description: Tracks when user types the first character after opening search screen. Helps measure search engagement.

events.name: home screen bottom nav search tab clicked
events.description: User taps the search tab in bottom navigation to open search screen.

events.name: nearest stop fetch failure
events.description: Failed to fetch nearby stops for a selected place.

events.name: nearest stop fetch success
events.description: Successfully fetched nearby stops for a selected place.

events.name: nearest stop selected
events.description: User selects one of the nearby stops shown after place selection.

events.name: no nearby stops found for place
events.description: No nearby stops were found for the selected place.

events.name: place search result selected
events.description: User selects a place/location from search results in trip planner. Triggers nearest stop fetch.

events.name: recent trip result clicked
events.description: User clicks a recent trip item from search suggestions. Combines universal item clicked properties with trip-specific origin/destination.

properties.context: Only if not recent or popular

events.name: regular bus page recent search card clicked
events.description: User clicks a recent search card shown on the regular bus page.

properties.context: Position index of the card clicked

events.name: retry nearest stop fetch clicked
events.description: User clicks retry after nearest stop fetch fails.

events.name: search clear query clicked
events.description: User clicks the clear button to reset search query. Includes top 3 results and time spent viewing results.

events.name: search result clicked
events.description: User selects a search result from the list. Tracks result details, position, and context.

events.name: search screen back clicked
events.description: User exits search screen via back button (toolbar or device). Tracks abandonment and includes top results.

events.name: search screen opened
events.description: Universal search screen is opened. Session tracking begins with a unique searchSessionId.

properties.context: Generated as timestamp at screen open
Type of search screen (universal, route, stop)
Screen from which search was initiated

events.name: show all nearby stops clicked
events.description: User clicks to view all nearby stops for a selected place.

events.name: stop search result selected
events.description: User selects a stop from search results in trip planner.

events.name: stop trip planner search from clicked
events.description: User clicks the FROM location field to select origin.

events.name: stop trip planner search recent clicked
events.description: User selects a recent trip from suggestions in trip planner.

properties.context: If from is a nearest stop selection
If to is a nearest stop selection

events.name: stop trip planner search screen opened
events.description: Stop-based trip planner search screen is opened for selecting from/to locations.

properties.context: Optional - screen before opening trip planner search

events.name: stop trip planner search to clicked
events.description: User clicks the TO location field to select destination.

events.name: swap button clicked
events.description: User clicks swap button to interchange from/to locations.

properties.context: If from is a nearest stop selection
If to is a nearest stop selection

events.name: universal item clicked
events.description: Legacy event for tracking clicks on universal search items. Triggered when route, stop, or place is clicked. Properties vary by item type.

properties.context: Item type: LOCATION, STOP, ROUTE, TRIP_STOP, TRIP_LOCATION
Only if not recent or popular item

events.notes: This is a legacy event. New code should use 'search result clicked' instead.

events.name: universal search city fetch from location failed

steps.label: Entry
events: home screen bottom nav search tab clicked
regular bus page recent search card clicked
steps.next: Universal Search or Trip Planner Search

steps.label: Universal Search Flow
events: first character type after search open
search result clicked / universal item clicked
steps.next: Route Details / Stop Details / Trip Planner

steps.label: Stop-Based Trip Planner Search
events: stop trip planner search screen opened
stop trip planner search from clicked / to clicked
stop search result selected / place search result selected

steps.label: Additional events
events: universal search city fetch from location failed

diagram.notes: Search flow has two main paths: Universal Search (for general route/stop/place search) and Stop-Based Trip Planner Search (for from/to trip planning). Both share similar search mechanics but have different UI and result handling.
